name: Metamorphosis LD#43
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/metamorphosis

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43

Theme:  Sacrifices must be made

Metamorphosis is a game about pretty butterflies and moths and blood sacrifice. Take damage to save time or to make any progression at all in this puzzle platformer.

Controls Keyboard

Left: A or L.Arrow

Right: D or R.Arrow

Jump: Space
